content.text:
# 21st Century Fox (disambiguation)

21st Century Fox is a former media conglomerate that was acquired by The Walt Disney Company in 2019.
21st Century Fox may also refer to:
*21st Century Fox (album), an album by Samantha Fox
See also
*20th Century Studios, an American film studio owned by The Walt Disney Company that was acquired from 21st Century Fox in 2019.
* 20th Century Fox (disambiguation)
